participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous with a love for nature and animals.
participant_1.background: I love lasagna like I'm Garfield. I want to be an astronaut when I grow up. I have a poster of Neil Tyson DeGrasse on my wall. My two dogs are the best friends a girl could have. Penn and Teller are my favorite magicians.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outdoorsy and straightforward, with a nostalgic view of life.
participant_2.background: I am a savage. I have no technological skills. I am stuck in the past due to remoteness. I love the outdoors.

content.text: I love the outdoors. I love hiking, camping, and fishing.
That's cool! I love the outdoors too. I like to go for walks in the park, and I love camping.
I'm kind of a savage. I don't have any technological skills.
That's okay. I'm not that great with technology either.
I'm stuck in the past because I live in a remote area.
That's okay. I'm from the city, but I like to go out and explore the wilderness.
I'm not much of a people person.
That's okay. I'm not much of a people person either. I'd rather spend time with my dogs.
I have two dogs. They're the best friends a girl could have.
That's nice. I have two dogs too. They're my best friends.
I want to be an astronaut when I grow up.
That's cool! I've always wanted to be an astronaut too.
I have a poster of Neil deGrasse Tyson on my wall. He's my favorite scientist.
I love lasagna. I'm like Garfield.
That's funny! I love lasagna too. It's my favorite food.
